title: Box to desk. Fast.

steps.title: Unpack
steps.desc: Lift frame from the box. Check the parts.

steps.title: Snap legs
steps.desc: Click-lock columns to the crossbar. Zero tools needed.

steps.title: Add feet
steps.desc: Screw in levellers. Balance the base.

steps.title: Mount top
steps.desc: Flip top face-down. Drop frame. Drive 6 screws.

steps.title: Plug in
steps.desc: Route spine cables. Connect the hub and power up.

steps.title: Calibrate
steps.desc: Flip upright. Hold ▼ for 5s. Ready to flow.

versionInfo: Co-financed by EU Funds. Fully WCAG 2.1 AA compliant.
